protocol.name: P-GSE51626-1
protocol.text: affymetrix-algorithm-name = rma program-name = Expression Console ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-2
protocol.text: After two weeks of growth, the medium was exchanged with either water or 2mM SA and 24h incubation was given in light at 22±2ºC.

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-3
protocol.text: Seed sterilization and plant growth conditions were followed as reported earlier (Hardtke and Deng, 2000) for both Arabidopsis thaliana Col-0 and npr1-1 mutant. All seeds were grown in vitro in MS medium by keeping them on a mesh at 4°C for 2 days for stratification before placing them in the growth chamber. A. thaliana plants were grown under controlled environmental conditions (22±1ºC, 120 mol m-2 sec-1, 16h light/8h dark cycle).

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from complete seedlings using Sigma Spectrum® Plant total RNA kit (STRN 250)

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol using 250 ng total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-6
protocol.text: According to affymatrix gene chip instruction manual using Fluidisc station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE51626-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using Affymatrix gene chip scanner.
